title: Michael's Advice
content: Sometimes, I'll start a sentence and I don't even know where it's going. I just hope I find it along the way.
author: Michael Scott

title: Phyllis' Confidence
content: I don't care if Ryan wants to sign his name in poop across the room, you should let him.
author: Phyllis Vance

title: Dwight's Responsibility
content: When I said that I wanted to breed, I did not mean in a petri dish, and I did not mean with a monkey.
author: Dwight Schrute

title: Kevin's Tip
content: If you have seven cats, you have no cats.
author: Kevin Malone

title: Stanley's Real Talk
content: The doctor said if I don't take a vacation, I'm going to die.
author: Stanley Hudson
